description: Plan and record of end-to-end (E2E) tests for the change
instruction:
Create a plan for the end-to-end tests to verify user flows and scenarios 
described in the specs. 
Ensure critical flows are tested from the user's perspective.
context:
Project: Traffic Webcams (webcams-trafico)
Tech Stack:
  - Expo (SDK 54)
  - React Native 0.81.5
  - React 19.1.0
  - NativeWind (Tailwind CSS 4.2.1)
  - TypeScript 5.9.2
  - Expo Router (file-based)
Coding Rules:
  - Los componentes deben usar kebab-case (ej: submit-button.tsx)
  - Priorizar clases de Tailwind mediante className (NativeWind)
  - Evitar StyleSheet.create y estilos inline
  - Usar expo-image para carga optimizada de im├ígenes
  - Rendimiento en listas: evitar funciones an├│nimas en renderItem y usar memoizaci├│n
rules: Describir el paso a paso del usuario en cada flujo
Asegurar que se contemplan los casos de error m├ís comunes
template:
# E2E Tests Plan

Context for testing should go here. It describes the primary user flows from the specs.

## E2E Tests Checklist

- [ ] Test the primary successful flow.
- [ ] Test edge cases and errors.

dependencies.description: Plan and record of unit tests for the change
